Type Method# transformable(by:)

iOS 17.0+iPadOS 17.0+Mac Catalyst 17.0+macOS 14.0+tvOS 17.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 10.0+Swift 5.9+

```
static func transformable(by transformerName: String) -> Schema.Attribute.Option
```

## [See Also](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/attribute/option/transformable(by:)-lunz#see-also)

### [Accessing property options](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/attribute/option/transformable(by:)-lunz#Accessing-property-options)

[`static var allowsCloudEncryption: Schema.Attribute.Option`](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/attribute/option/allowscloudencryption)Stores the property’s value in an encrypted form.[`static var externalStorage: Schema.Attribute.Option`](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/attribute/option/externalstorage)Stores the property’s value as binary data adjacent to the model storage.[`static var preserveValueOnDeletion: Schema.Attribute.Option`](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/attribute/option/preservevalueondeletion)Preserves the property’s value in the persistent history when the context deletes the owning model.[`static var spotlight: Schema.Attribute.Option`](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/attribute/option/spotlight)Indexes the property’s value so it can appear in Spotlight search results.[`static var unique: Schema.Attribute.Option`](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/attribute/option/unique)Ensures the property’s value is unique across all models of the same type.[`static func transformable(by: ValueTransformer.Type) -> Schema.Attribute.Option`](/documentation/swiftdata/schema/attribute/option/transformable(by:)-9d4xh)Transforms the property’s value between an in-memory form and a persisted form.
